name: NumberWall
description:
This app aims to help you learn the numbers from 0-100 in various languages through a simple game. A written form of the word is shown and ten possible answers. If you are not sure some options will be removed after a time to help you.
Currently the game supports ten languages:

  • Danish
  • English
  • French
  • German
  • Irish
  • Jèrriais
  • Manx
  • Norweigian
  • Spanish
  • Swedish

This app is open source with the code being available at: https://github.com/liamgh/NumberWall

Have fun!

Attn Android users! NumberWall will be on the Google Play store soon once it has been reviewed.
